title: Graeme Brown (footballer)
text:
Graeme Brown (born 8 November 1980 in <a href="Johannesburg">Johannesburg</a>, South Africa) is a South African-born Scottish <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="striker%20%28football%29">striker</a> . Brown began his career at <a href="Cowdenbeath%20F.C.">Cowdenbeath</a> as a 16-year-old in 1997. He scored 60 goals in six and a half years at Central Park, earning a move to <a href="Ayr%20United%20F.C.">Ayr United</a> in January 2004. His appearances for the club were restricted by a broken foot and he moved to <a href="Alloa%20Athletic%20F.C.">Alloa Athletic</a> in March 2005.
He was released from Alloa to his former club Cowdenbeath in the January 2009 transfer window.
After struggling to find goals in Cowdenbeath's run in to the 2008/09 season, Brown was released by mutual consent. He has now retired from professional football and works as a solicitor in Glasgow.
